name: Gang Brawl Crime City
description:
Play as a hero killer gangster mafia legend to take revenge from those land mafia who has taken over their land. The grand killer legend who is an ex-mafia godfather, a real hitman, ​and a dangerous don is back in action with yet another crime games adventure “Mafia Gangster Lands”. He is spreading terror with his dangerous attack, shooting, spy assassin and criminal escape skills. This time no security operation can make his survival impossible. He has figured out a few survival options in the city to get his land back. The underworld crime network is stronger this time. Seek help from the elite master hitman and other criminals for your survival missions. Shoot and assassinate those who come your way to become a grand gang godfather. Shoot to kill security squad, carry out land vacating missions, assassinate spy agent, survive criminal escape police chase mission and win the gang war. Sneak away from an attack, a police chase gunshot, escape like a hero and rule the underworld downtown lands. Enjoy this fun addictive game with a mafia underworld boss! Be prepared for any situation. Shoot before the hunters hunt you down.


The story takes place in a fictional sin city of US previously known as ‘Gangster Lands’. After the industrial revolution of the 80s, it became the hub of many businesses. The lands that once belonged to the gangster mobs were taken over by the land Mafia to build their industries. Sam a.k.a. Druggy belongs to one of those gangster groups whose families once lived there. He is a part-time worker at Lawrence factory owned by a big Mafia person Mr. Lawrence. Now Sam is tired of working for them & is planning with the underground mobs to take their lands back from Land Mafia by shutting down their industries. Be prepared to fight & attack your rival Land mafia, spy cops, and police officers, squad. Transform the peaceful city into a gangster sin city to take revenge from the land mafia. Plan extreme escape missions. Meet other notorious grand criminals, fight the brutally targeted missions, escape from the inescapable security police chase and use your driving simulator, first-person shooting, and third person shooter skills. Escape, Run, Fight & shoot to carry out different criminal activities including robbery, clash, assassin, agent killing, theft, war and much more in stealth mode. Play Brave new blood criminal thrilling adventure against police chase for a greater cause to plan a great crime threat for the city before the police squad cars arrive. Play an ultimate action-packed gang war in a stealth mode like a hero. Sneak, shot and kill to become a killer legend gang boss. Go back to New York and Chicago to bring back the terror.

Gameplay Includes:
* Hand to Hand Combat, Melee Weapons & Shooting
* Earn money to buy drinks & lock-picks
* Use lock-picks to unlock different Vehicles
* Pedestrian System
